title: #1524 Lockdown Umpires
itunes:title: #1524 Lockdown Umpires
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the abhorrent messaging surrounding kids & covid specifically with people like Dr. Fauci and his pretending not to know the benefits of natural immunity. They then speak to a caller who has questions about the VAERS system for reporting vaccine incidents. Adam then harkens back to Dr. Fauci and plays the clip from September 2021 of him pretending not to know the effectiveness of natural immunity. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
Con-Cret.com/podcast
TruBill.com/ADS
Geico.com
